description:
Suigin is pulled into the world of “Grave Buster” by a woman named Twin Star. Surprisingly, Suigin ends up meeting his grandfather, Riku Yuuki, who should’ve been dead, and he can’t hide his doubts about this whole situation. Then a woman named Shostia performs a ritual that reawakens Suigin’s childhood memories. Before they can enjoy their reunion, they are attacked by someone...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Suigin`s Chance Encounter with His Grandfather!
水銀, 祖父と邂逅する!
